course.name: Database Design
course.description: This course covers the principles of database design, including data modeling, normalization, and SQL query optimization. Students will learn how to design efficient and scalable databases for various applications.

course.name: Computer Workshop Instructor
course.description: Teaching course syllabus to first-year students. The syllabus contains essential computer science topics, such as network, git,Linux, and web programming(backend and frontend).
